txt.en: 'Hullo! Would you like to be an \qAcquaintance\q of Thorin's Hall? Well look no further! Completion of this quest should do just that for you.\n\n'If this sounds good to you, speak to me again!'
'Alright, soon Thorin's Hall will consider you an Acquaintance. Ready?'
By completing this quest, you will be considered an Acquaintance of Thorin's Hall.
